definition: Heinrich Heine (1797-1856), German lyric poet
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
to blacken/abbr. for 涅槃[nie4 pan2]

sentences.english: She gave a recitation of a poem by Heine .
sentences.chinese: 她朗誦了海涅的一首詩。

sentences.english: The German poet Heine was Jewish.
sentences.chinese: 德國大詩人海涅是猶太人。

sentences.english: So she went for a job at the publisher William Heinemann.
sentences.chinese: 最後她在海涅曼出版公司找到了一個工作。
